text: This list contains people associated with the Selwyn House School in Westmount, Quebec, Canada, including current and former headmasters, as well as notable alumni and faculty. == Notable alumni == * John Aimers (1951-), founder of the Monarchist League of CanadaVeritas, December 1974 * Joel Anthony (1982-), basketball player (Detroit Pistons)Selwyn House School ~ Joel Anthony '99 playing in the NBA * Eldon Pattyson Black (1925-1999), diplomatSelwyn House School Yearbook 1949Selwyn House School Yearbook 1962 * Charles Bronfman (1931-), businessmanCharles Bronfman | Ordre de Montréal * Edgar Bronfman Sr. (1929-2013), businessmanThe invisible thread that unites all Jews * Edward Bronfman (1927-2005), businessmanSelwyn House School Yearbook 1939 * Peter Bronfman (1929-1996), (1900-1940), military officerMontreal-born WWII hero honoured for his efforts at Dunkirk * David Culver (1924-2017), businessmanSelwyn House School | Obituary: David Culver '39 * Andre Desmarais (1956-), businessman.Selwyn House School Yearbook 1973 * Olivier Desmarais, businessmanPolitics a great human endeavour, Chrétien tells Selwyn House studentsSelwyn House School Yearbook 1999 * James
